name: Dragon Hunter
overview: A horizontally scrolling Shoot'em Up game. Step into the shoes of a space explorer and prepare for a perilous mission. The command of the interstellar forces has entrusted the important task of exploring a naked planet rich in water, forests and ancient buildings. Unfortunately for you, the planet is also populated by unfriendly dragons whose simple touch will inexorably decrease your vital energy. To defend yourself, you can attempt to jump them or take them out with your laser rifle. Once done move on to another sector of the planet. Keep an eye on your energy, displayed in the table at the bottom right. Remember that in this table shows energy, lives and score. Now take out the dragons in all their forms.
